text:
It’s Steve and Maggie – Happy Halloween!
Happy Halloween! Hehe. Come on! Let's play

some tricks on Steve. Yeah! Thank you and 
happy Halloween! Oh hello boys and girls,

I'm ready for Halloween, with this bag of 
Halloween treats, like these biscuits, sweets,

chocolate and lollipops. Oh, and don't forget 
the Halloween tricks! Haha! What? My Halloween

trick didn't scare you? No, it will! Haha! Bang! 
See, I scared you, didn't I? Oh! What was that?

Oh, it's an owl! Oh but look! It's 
getting dark, so it's bye bye Mr. Sun

and hello Mr. Moon! Come on, let's go home.
Oh! I love Halloween, do you boys and girls?

I'm excited to play a trick on Maggie, when we 
get home. Oh! Wait a minute, what's that? Over

there! What is it? What is it, oh it's too dark 
to see! Can you see what it is boys and girls? Oh,

I know! Let's ask Mr. Moon to shine bright!
Mr. Moon, moon Mr. Silver Moon, shine bright this

Halloween. Oh! Oh look! It's a ghost! Oh, but it's 
not a real ghost, no it's a Halloween decoration.

Look, it's a ghost! It's a ghost a ghost a scary 
ghost, here for Halloween. Oh, but I'm not scared

of that ghost! No, no, no! Hello Steve!
What?! The ghost, is real! It's a real ghost!

Oh. Was that a real ghost boys and girls? Or 
just a Halloween decoration. Oh, it must be a

decoration. Stop being so silly. Come on, let's 
go back home. I want to play my Halloween trick

on Maggie. Oh, I love playing trick or treat 
do you boys and girls? Yeah! Hold on! Is there

something on my head? Is it a spider?
Oh no! It's just a bit of that bush!

Oh dear, I'm getting so jumpy. Oh! What's that?! 
Over there! What's there?! Can you see something,

boys and girls? What is it?! Oh, I can't see 
it, we need more moonlight. Oh, moonlight!

Mr. Moon, moon Mr. Silver Moon,
shine bright this Halloween.

Look! It's a skeleton! Yeah. Is it a real 
skeleton? Um, oh no, Look! It's another

Halloween decoration. What a great skeleton! Look!
It's a skeleton a skeleton a scary skeleton,

here for Halloween. Oh, look at the skeleton! 
Yay. I'm not scared of that skeleton. No, no,

no. Wait. Oh, Steve! Dance with me. Dance, dance. 
The skeleton! He's dancing! It's a real skeleton!

Oh no! Oh, look at the mud on 
my face boys and girls. Oh dear!

Oh! And what's that?! Oh look! It's 
a pumpkin! A Halloween pumpkin!

Oh, I like the scary faces on Halloween pumpkins. 
Do you? Show me your, scary pumpkin face.

And sing with me. It's a pumpkin a pumpkin 
a scary pumpkin, here for Halloween. Oh,

what a great pumpkin! Happy Halloween Steve! 
Oh, look! The pumpkin is talking. It's alive!

Oh, look at me boys and girls! What 
am I doing? I'm hiding from a pumpkin!

I can't stay here. Oh no, no, no! I've got 
to go home and play that trick on Maggie.

Yeah! Oh, I hope we don't see any more 
Halloween decorations in this park.

Oh no! I think there's something there. Oh, what 
is it? Can you see it boys and girls? I can't. We

need more moonlight, don't we? So come on! Sing 
with me! Mr. Moon, moon, Mr. Silver Moon, shine

bright this Halloween. Oh I was right, there is 
something there! It's a monster, but is it alive?!

Mr. Monster! Mr. Monster! Oh no good, it's just 
a Halloween decoration. So come on! Sing with me!

Look! It's a monster a monster a scary monster, 
here for Halloween. Okay Mr. Monster be nice,

stay there. I just want to go home and play 
a trick on Maggie. I'm going to catch you.

Run Steve, run! Phew. Oh, I'm finally back home 
and can play trick or treat with Maggie. So she

doesn't guess it's me, I've got a scary mask in 
this bag and do you want to see it? Really? Okay.

Oh scary, or what hey? Right, 
let's go and play trick or treat.

Trick or treat! I know Maggie hasn't got any 
treats, so I'm going to get a trick out of my bag.

Oh, Maggie hates spiders. Hi Steve! Oh!
Hi, sorry. I haven't got any treats.

No treats?! Oh dear, then it's a trick for you.
Oh, catch! I hate spiders! Oh get it off me.

Oh Maggie! It's me! I got you! That was a 
great Halloween trick, wasn't it? Yeah! But

not as good as my Halloween tricks. What 
do you mean Maggie? Remember these guys?

Abracadabra! Oh! Oh look boys and girls, look 
at these Halloween decorations. Yeah! So that

was you Maggie, playing a trick 
on me you naughty naughty bird!
